bill_title: to provide for a school district transportation levy.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for a school district transportation levy. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 13-16-2 be amended to read as follows: 13-16-2. All school district funds shall be placed in either the general fund, capital outlay fund, special education fund, public service enterprise fund, trust or agency fund as defined in § 4-4-4, bond redemption fund or , 874 fund , or transportation fund as hereinafter defined. Section 2. That chapter 13-16 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The transportation fund is a fund provided to meet student transportation or room and board expenses. Section 3. That chapter 13-16 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: A school board may in addition to any other tax levy provided by law authorize an annual levy not to exceed one dollar per one thousand dollars of taxable valuation for the transportation fund. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
